messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] what's going on here?
messages.msgSnippet: At the risk of breaking the two week lurk rule, I would like to say that I am so glad to see off topic discussions are allowed here. I am on some lists where
messages.messageBody:
At the risk of breaking the two week lurk rule, I would like to say that I am so glad to see "off topic" discussions are allowed here. I am on some lists where the slightest stray from the purpose of the list is scolded and I hate that.
I'll shut up and lurk now:)
Denese
----- Original Message -----
From: starsuncloud@...
To: Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Friday, November 08, 2002 2:26 AM
Subject: [Unschooling-dotcom] what's going on here?


In a message dated 11/7/02 10:15:07 PM Central Standard Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:

<< And instead, all I've read is juvenile arguments concerning others
religious convictions! I'm hoping that I just caught you all on a bad day.
>>

Yeah, that's about it.
It only takes a couple of lame posts to get us riled up!! :) Hope you'll
stick around to see the good days....and there's some good stuff sprinkled in
between the religion posts.If you just hit your delete key and be patient I
think you'll get more information here than any other list!

Ren

~~~~ Don't forget! If you change topics, change the subject line! ~~~~

~Kelly
